data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 59,346 believers in Nana-Mambéré, Central African Republic a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nana-Mambéré, Central African Republic
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 125,654 people in Nana-Mambéré who are far from you. Please add 37 new house churches this year.

data.section_summary: On average, 28 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Nana-Mambéré, Central African Republic.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Nana-Mambéré.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Nana-Mambéré, Central African Republic.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Hausa people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Nana-Mambéré, Central African Republic.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Nana-Mambéré. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.section_summary:
the state of Nana-Mambéré, Central African Republic has a population of 185,000.

We estimate Nana-Mambéré has 59,346 people who might know Jesus, 72,753 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 52,901 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Nana-Mambéré who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
